description:
Without a clear understanding of the situation, Tomoharu becomes a handler of an Asura Machina. Taking a break from his life`s new problems, Tomoharu goes to visit his landlord Shioizumi, a strange old man living in a room full of spirals. “I hope you can make the decision that`s right for you.” Confused by the old man`s words, Tomoharu bumps into Kanade, who happens to live at the shrine. Tomoharu seeks answers to his questions about Misao, Kanade, and the Asura Machina, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: About Being Destroyed in the Future
Mirai ni Horobiru to Iu Koto
未来に滅びるということ
